parameters.definition: Total time over which the object is moving

description: The objective is to minimize the total fuel \sum_{t=0}^{\param{TotalTime}-1} |\param{a_t}| spent subject to the initial position \param{InitialPosition}, initial velocity \param{InitialVelocity}, final position \param{FinalPosition}, final velocity \param{FinalVelocity}, and total time \param{TotalTime}.
